title: Turn Up Your Rhythm (Coca Cola / Jungle Cover)
lyrics:
Lyrics from 
Coca-Cola ad
[Verse: Jung Kook]
I lost (
Turn me up
) my mind in the city of light
In the (
Turn me up
) backstreets buildings and the neon lights
When I heard (
Turn me up
) the thunder, I could feel the rain
(
Turn me up
)
It's (
Turn me up
) the same to me, just a different name
[Pre-Chorus]
(Turn me up)
(Turn me up)
(Turn me up)
(Turn me up)
[Chorus: Jung Kook, 
Jung Kook & Jimin & V
, 
V
, 
Jin
, *All*]
Won't you follow me 
into the jungle
 (Oh)
Ain't no god on my streets
 
in the heart of the jungle
 (Oh)
Won't you follow me
 *into the jungle* (Oh)
Into the jungle
